1.title: Atlas PC Builder
1.description: Build your dream PC by selecting components from various categories. View detailed information and create a custom PC configuration.
features: Browse and select components from different categories
View detailed information about each component
Add selected components to the PC builder to create a custom PC configuration
View a summary of the selected components in the PC builder
Complete the PC build once at least 5-6 components are added
Responsive design for a seamless user experience on different devices
1.technologies: Next.js, Ant Design, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS, NextAuth.js, MongoDB, ExpressJS, NodeJS

2.title: CodeVerse - Course Website
2.description: CodeVerse offers a comprehensive online course website catered to aspiring programmers. Browse courses, enroll, and empower your coding journey!
features: View a list of courses in the catalog
Search for courses by category, level, and topic
Enroll in courses of interest
Responsive design for seamless user experience on different devices
Robust API and Firebase integration for secure data storage and user authentication
2.technologies: React JS, Daisy UI, Tailwind CSS, Node JS, Express JS, Firebase, Vercel

3.title: OwlBook
3.description: OwlBook is an intuitive catalog management and exploration web application, delivering an exceptional user experience.
features: View a list of books in the catalog
Search for books by title, author, genre, or publication year
Add new books and edit existing entries
Write and submit reviews for books
Robust Mongoose, Express JS, and Node JS back-end integration for secure data management
React Hook Form and Redux Persist for enhanced form handling and state persistence
3.technologies: React, Redux, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Mongoose, ExpressJS, NodeJS

4.title: The Quiz Hero - Quiz Web App
4.description: The Quiz Hero is an engaging and interactive quiz web application, skillfully crafted with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
features: Engage in fun and educational quizzes on various topics
Test knowledge with multiple-choice questions
Receive instant feedback on quiz performance
User-friendly interface and captivating design for an enjoyable experience
